translation.en: [man on tape, in Hindi] Gambling is a part of life.
If not cricket, people would bet on something else.
Our business thrives only by being illegal.
translation.ko: 저희 사업은 불법적으로만 성공할 수 있습니다

translation.en: If it's all cash, then it has to be black money.
We are villains, we are not heroes.
[Aniruddha Bahal, in English] I'm passionate about cricket like any Indian.
translation.ko: 다른 인도 사람들처럼 저도 크리켓을 좋아합니다

translation.en: The game is a beautiful game.
Poetry in motion.
So, when I started sports reporting,
I never imagined that I would be breaking the lid off anything.
translation.ko: 무언가를 폭로하게 될 줄은 상상도 못 했습니다

translation.en: [commentator 1] And India's captain has reached his half-century.
[commentator 2] That is out.

it was a very different game
and a very ugly game.
[reporter 1] The cricketing community has been stunned.

translation.ko: 그냥 정말 화가 나요 아주 열받죠

translation.en: [reporter 2] Absolutely explosive.
What will happen next is impossible to say.
translation.ko: 또 무엇이 있을지 전혀 알 수 없습니다

translation.en: [Ravi Sawani] The kind of allegations being made,
they were absolutely unbelievable.
[Minty Tejpal] We came up with this plan to target and trap the cricketers
translation.ko: 이 계획을 통해 선수들을 목표로 해서 잡아냈죠

translation.en: using spy cam equipment, and get the truth out.
translation.ko: 스파이 캠 장비를 사용하고 진실을 끄집어냈어요

translation.en: Treachery.
Like you've been stabbed in the back.
[reporter 3] Now, serious concerns.
Can cricket survive?
[commentator 1] Lovely shot. Glorious shot!
[Sharda Ugra] The '90s was the era of superstardom in Indian cricket.
[commentator 2] And he's picked that up very cleanly.
They became as famous and important as film stars.
translation.ko: 선수들은 영화배우처럼 유명해졌죠 "샤르다 우그라 스포츠 기자"

translation.en: [commentator 2] What a wonderful catch! That's a brilliant catch!
The unpredictability, the beauty of it, the suspense unraveling…
translation.ko: 예측할 수 없는 요소 아름다움, 긴장되는 전개 "스리람 카리 저널리스트 및 기자"

translation.en: Anything could happen.
[commentator 2] Trouble! Big trouble.
[Karri] It didn't matter who you are, where you came from,
you can be the hero of the whole country.
translation.ko: 국가 전체의 영웅이 될 수 있죠

translation.en: [Ugra] We wanted to follow our stars.
[all chanting] India! India!
We saw almost a utopian version of what cricket is.
But when it came to issues around gambling, I was completely naïve.
translation.ko: 하지만 도박 문제에 관해서는 전혀 몰랐죠

translation.en: Betting is illegal in India.
So when we started hearing about bookies,
we knew it wasn't good stuff,
translation.ko: 그리 좋은 일이 아니라는 걸 눈치챘죠

translation.en: but we were just rookie reporters. We didn't know what was going on.
translation.ko: 하지만 저희는 신입 기자였고 상황 파악도 안 됐죠

translation.en: We needed someone to just unravel everything.
[Bahal] Nobody sees the world as an investigative reporter.
translation.ko: 취재 기자가 보는 세상이 따로 있죠

translation.en: See, initially, I never used to cover sports.
Then, uh, one of our journalists in Outlook, I think, he fell sick.
translation.ko: 당시 아웃룩의 저널리스트 중 한 명이 아팠던 것 같아요

translation.en: And so, I became a sports reporter by accident.
translation.ko: 그래서 우연하게도 제가 스포츠 기자가 됐어요

translation.en: So I was always an outsider.
I had few individual friends,
but I was never part of that club, so to speak.
They never broke stories.
They never pointed the finger at negative stuff.
And I felt that they owed their audience much more.
translation.ko: 저는 이들이 관중들에게 피해를 주고 있다고 느꼈어요

translation.en: I remember '97…
I was sitting in the press box,
and I noticed there was a whole sort of atmosphere of tension.
What was strange
was some of the journalists would, uh, start getting calls.
They were talking about what would happen in the match,
who is being dropped, who is not being dropped,
how is the pitch going to behave.
He was giving them odds.
And then I realized that, "Oh, man! The calls were from bookies."
You're not supposed to be talking to bookies from the press box.
That's an ethical concern.
I felt a sense of outrage about it.
That set me thinking. "What the hell is happening?"
How deep does it go? How big is the money?
translation.ko: 얼마나 심각한 상태인 거지? 얼마나 큰 돈이 걸린 거지?

translation.en: So, I then started digging, so to speak.
translation.ko: 그 후 이 문제를 파고들기 시작했어요

translation.en: And I managed to find some bookies.
They wouldn't allow me to film them or take photographs.
In fact, they didn't even tell us their names.
But eventually, some of them were willing to talk.
translation.ko: 하지만 결국 기꺼이 얘기해줄 사람을 찾았죠

translation.en: [bookie, in Hindi] Every bookie starts out as a punter.
translation.ko: 도박업자는 모두 도박꾼으로 시작합니다 "익명의 도박업자의 목소리"

translation.en: In college, I had many vices, but no money.
translation.ko: 대학교에서 나쁜 짓을 해댔지만 돈은 없었어요

translation.en: Gambling was the quick fix.
translation.ko: 도박은 이 문제를 빠르게 해결할 방법이었죠

translation.en: When I got addicted to money, I started making others play.
translation.ko: 돈에 중독되었을 즈음에 다른 도박을 만들기 시작했어요

translation.en: To kickstart the work, we need a whole team.
Many people call this a bookie den.
translation.ko: 많은 이들이 이걸 도박업자의 소굴이라고 합니다

translation.en: We call it a shop.
[in English] It used to be a madhouse. And the phones used to be all abuzz.
translation.ko: 정신 병원 같았어요 전화기가 쉴 새 없이 울렸죠

translation.en: Wickets falling, runs being made, the odds would keep changing.
translation.ko: 위켓은 떨어지고 점수는 나고 배당은 계속 변했어요

translation.en: So, back then, it all used to run on trust.
translation.ko: 당시에 도박은 모두 신뢰를 기반으로 진행됐어요

translation.en: They have to know who you are for them to accept your bets.
translation.ko: 베팅을 걸려면 업자들에게 자신이 누군지 알려줘야 했죠

translation.en: [bookie, in Hindi] Everyone is betting.
Maybe a shopkeeper, maybe a bank manager,
even college students, especially girls.
They think, "Yes, I can win this."
It is a craze. Everybody wants to become rich.
translation.ko: 도박은 크게 유행했습니다 모두 부자가 되기를 원하니까요

translation.en: [in English] It was alarming. I remember some of them used to record those calls,
so the punters couldn't go back on what they had bet on.
[bookie, in Hindi] If you try to swindle us, you'll be in danger.
translation.ko: 저희에게 사기를 치려고 하면 위험에 처하게 되죠

translation.en: The one who gambles never wins.
The bookie never loses.
This is the truth.
[Ugra, in English] There was a great appetite for gambling,
and it was pan-Indian like cricket.
You could bet on anything.
So, what is the team score going to be after ten overs?
translation.ko: 10회 오버 후에 팀 점수는 어떻게 될까?

translation.en: How many sixes is a particular batsman going to hit?
Punters even place bets on field placings and bowling changes.
translation.ko: 도박꾼들은 심지어 필드 위치와 볼링 변화를 두고 베팅했어요

translation.en: And so, for a bookie to have information gave them a huge advantage.
translation.ko: 그러니 도박꾼들에게 정보란 큰 이점이 되는 것이죠

translation.en: Information was power at that time.
translation.ko: 당시에는 정보가 힘이었어요 "경기 인도 VS 남부"

translation.en: [Bahal] There were bookmakers giving us stories
translation.ko: 특정한 경기에서 방망이를 이상하게 휘둘렀는지와 같은

translation.en: about how in a particular match the bets swung very suspiciously.
translation.ko: 내용을 전달해주는 도박 표 업자가 있었어요

translation.en: It would raise suspicions, that somebody has inside information.
translation.ko: 의심은 깊어져 갔어요 누가 내부 정보를 안다고요

translation.en: What is that inside information?
That set me thinking,
did the bookies have power over the players?
[all] Out!
In the '90s, cable television had come
and it brought Indian cricket into every village in the country.
translation.ko: 인도의 모든 마을에 인도 크리켓이 방영됐죠

translation.en: And so, the greatest dream for any Indian boy of that generation
translation.ko: 이 시대 모든 인도 소년들의 가장 큰 꿈은

translation.en: was to play for India.
There was a sudden hope
that even if you were from a small town,
you could become a hero.
A whole new generation of players had come along.
translation.ko: 이에 따라 새로운 세대의 선수들이 등장했어요

translation.en: These kids who are coming from small towns.
So it was all very new to them, and at that time,
there were no gatekeepers for access to cricketers.
translation.ko: 크리켓 선수는 어디든지 갈 수 있었죠

translation.en: Indian cricket at that time was filled with these people
translation.ko: 인도의 크리켓은 당시에 이런 사람들이 많았어요

translation.en: who were seen everywhere around the team.
translation.ko: 팀이 있는 곳이면 어디든지 나타나는 사람들이요

translation.en: Strange people are walking into the Indian dressing room
who wanted to shower favors on them.
You know, who are these people?
[Bahal] So I started talking to a lot of ex-players.
translation.ko: 많은 이전 선수에게 물어봤어요 "선수 정보 크리켓"

translation.en: But a lot of them didn't want to speak on record.
translation.ko: 하지만 대부분 자신의 말이 기록되는 걸 싫어했죠

translation.en: But I always try and dig some more, try and dig some more.
translation.ko: 하지만 저는 항상 조금이라도 더 파고들려고 노력했어요

translation.en: And finally, I found…
Manoj Prabhakar.
[commentator] Well bowled! That's the inswinger, the late movement in.
[Ugra] Manoj Prabhakar,
he was a seam-bowling all-rounder for India.
translation.ko: 이 선수는 심 볼링 투구를 사용하는 인도의 올라운더였죠

translation.en: Great competitor and a fighting cricketer.
But he was always seen as a journeyman player.
A lot of people called him the poor man's Kapil Dev.
translation.ko: 이 선수는 가난한 이들의 카필 데브라고 불렸죠

translation.en: He's not a good athlete.
You know?
He is a poor athlete, and that is a very, very big point.
translation.ko: "카필 데브 전 인도 주장" 형편없는 선수였어요 이게 아주 중요한 점입니다

translation.en: [Ugra] Prabhakar was always very fiery. He had many chips on his shoulder.
translation.ko: 마노즈 프라바카르의 성격은 언제나 불같았어요 거만하고 자기중심적이었죠

translation.en: [in Hindi] People are of the opinion that your temper is very unpredictable,
translation.ko: 사람들은 당신의 성질을 예측할 수가 없다고들 했습니다

translation.en: and you have said that using profanity is in my nature?
translation.ko: 그리고 욕을 하는 게 자신의 본성이라고 했죠?

translation.en: [in Hindi] When you play with passion,
if you are not fired up, you'll lose everything.
translation.ko: 흥분하지 않으면 모든 걸 잃게 됩니다

translation.en: If I don't show aggression on the ground,
a player like me cannot perform.
[in English] I was scared to ask questions because I thought he'll slam the phone.
translation.ko: 저는 질문하는 게 무서웠어요 전화기를 집어 던질 것 같아서요

translation.en: [in Hindi] No one is supporting you, inside or outside of the team.
translation.ko: 팀 안에서나 밖에서나 당신 편을 안 들어주네요

translation.en: What's the reason for that? Were you on good terms with them or not?
translation.ko: 그 이유는 무엇일까요? 다른 선수와는 잘 지냈나요?

translation.en: No one was allowed to raise their voice.
Fear might be the big reason for it.
Because whoever has spoken up, he's faced problems.
translation.ko: 누구든 목소리를 높이면 제가 가만 안 둘 거니까요

translation.en: [Bahal, in English] Manoj had just retired in '96
because the World Cup hadn't gone too well for him.
And after that, he'd been dropped.
translation.ko: 그 후 그는 방출되었죠 "마노즈 프라바카르 인도팀에서 방출"

translation.en: So, I called and asked him, what did he know?
translation.ko: 저는 전화를 걸고 물어봤어요 그가 무엇을 아는지

translation.en: What would he be willing to share?
Manoj had a very gruff exterior.
He had a very contemptuous dig at journalists.
[in Hindi] You don't dare print the truth. You don't have the guts.
translation.ko: 감히 누구도 진실을 발표하지 못할 겁니다 그럴 배짱이 없으니까요

translation.en: [in English] So there was a lot of that attitude in Manoj.
translation.ko: 마노즈 프라바카르의 태도에 많은 문제가 있었죠

translation.en: Manoj took a lot of convincing. I remember meeting him several times.
translation.ko: 그는 많은 설득을 받았어요 몇 번 만났던 게 기억납니다

translation.en: But finally, he opened a lot, he told me a lot of stories.
translation.ko: 마침내 그는 마음을 열고 많은 이야기를 해주었어요

translation.en: Then suddenly told me that an Indian player
had approached him about throwing a match.
It was a revelation.
That was the first time a former Indian cricket player
came on record saying this had happened.
translation.ko: 이런 일이 있었다고 기록에 응한 건 처음이었어요

translation.en: There was no question we would run the story.
It was something we wanted to make a lot of noise with.
So I wrote this in, uh, June of 1997.
translation.ko: "아웃룩 감춰진 인도 최악의 비밀" 이걸 쓴 게 1997년 6월이었어요

translation.en: "India's Worst Kept Secret" which was the first time that anybody
translation.ko: '감춰진 인도 최악의 비밀' 아무도 모를 때

translation.en: even knew that there was match-fixing in cricket.
translation.ko: 크리켓에 조작이 있었다는 걸 처음으로 알리게 되었죠

translation.en: And Manoj's famous allegation really caught a cat on the hot tin roof.
Manoj Prabhakar recently created a sensation
by alleging that he'd been offered a large sum of money to throw,
which means deliberately lose,
an international cricket match.
translation.ko: 큰 금액을 제안받은 혐의를 받고 있습니다

translation.en: [Ugra] "I was offered rupees 25 lakh
for sabotaging the match in Pakistan's favor."
"I was told to play below my usual standard."
"I told him to get out of my room."
translation.ko: '그 후 그자에게 내 방에서 나가라고 했습니다'

translation.en: It was shocking, the scale of money.
translation.ko: "승부조작 증가" 금액의 규모가 충격적이었어요 "위협적인 돈의 힘"

translation.en: And the fact that he'd been asked by a fellow teammate to do it,
translation.ko: 동료 팀원에게 그런 부탁을 받았다는 게

translation.en: that was what was unsettling.
Sport is fundamentally meant to be unscripted.
The unexpectedness of it is what makes it special.
translation.ko: 예측할 수 없는 부분이 스포츠를 특별하게 만들죠

translation.en: If it's scripted,
it takes away everything that sport stands for.
translation.ko: 스포츠의 의미를 전부 앗아가는 거나 다름없어요

translation.en: And so we just got the feeling
something terrible was about to break through in Indian cricket.
translation.ko: 끔찍한 일이 일어날 것 같은 느낌을 받았죠

translation.en: But I think a lot of people didn't want to believe it.
translation.ko: 하지만 많은 사람들이 믿고 싶지 않을 거라 생각해요

translation.en: [Karri] Cricket was suddenly growing, growing, growing.
Match-fixing.
Suddenly that shadow, match-fixing.
It's like on a sunny day you're playing a match,
translation.ko: 맑은 날에 경기를 뛰다가 갑자기 구름이 끼고

translation.en: suddenly clouds, thunder, rains and the match stops.
translation.ko: 뇌우가 쏟아져 경기를 멈추는 것과 같았죠

translation.en: Match-fixing allegations cast a doubt.
But I think, by and large, nobody wanted to trust Manoj Prabhakar.
translation.ko: "마노즈 프라바카르 방어적 자세를 취하다" 사람들은 마노즈 프라바카르를 믿지 않으려 했을 겁니다

translation.en: [reporter] As Prabhakar refuses to name the player
who he claims approached him to fix the match,
critics have wondered if his allegations bear any substance.
translation.ko: 비평가들은 그의 주장이 사실인지 의심하고 있습니다

translation.en: His lawyer maintains that as Prabhakar cannot prove his allegation,
translation.ko: 변호사는 마노즈 프라바카르가 자신의 주장을 입증할 수 없어

translation.en: it is up to authorities to investigate.
[Bahal] There was a lot of skepticism.
A lot of aggression towards us.
And the officials who ran the game
had an ostrich-like attitude right from the beginning.
Here is a sport that you love so much.
Here is wrongdoing that you know about. But nobody wanted to do anything.
translation.ko: 잘못된 일이 벌어지는 걸 아는데 모두 어떤 행동도 하지 않았어요

translation.en: [Ugra] Many in the cricket establishment
did not want to upset this lovely little world.
translation.ko: 이 자그마한 멋진 스포츠를 부수고 싶지 않아 했어요

translation.en: "Everything is so comfortable, we are so happy, money is coming."
"This is nonsense. Let it not rock the boat."
That story was looked down on and treated so shabbily.
It suddenly just went into a pool of nothingness.
translation.ko: 이 상황은 갑자기 아무것도 아니게 되었어요

translation.en: Manoj Prabhakar was cast into the wilderness.
[Bahal] The cricket board was so unhappy
translation.ko: 크리켓 이사회는 기분이 상해 5천만 루피를 청구했죠

translation.en: they went and sued us for five crores.
translation.ko: 크리켓 이사회는 기분이 상해 5천만 루피를 청구했죠 "아웃룩, 마노즈 프라바카르 5천만을 청구당함"

translation.en: They wanted to put a lid on it.
translation.ko: 이사회는 이 내용을 숨기려 했어요 "본 혐의에 더 이상 주목할 필요가 없다"

translation.en: Cricket went on, but the story was just dying to come out.
translation.ko: 크리켓은 계속됐지만 조작 이야기는 사라지고 있었죠

translation.en: And when it actually happened,
the strange part about it is that it happened by accident.
translation.ko: 이상한 점은 폭로가 우연히 벌어졌다는 것입니다

translation.en: In 2000, there was a gentleman who made a complaint
that he had been receiving threatening calls
and, uh, people were trying to extort money from him.
translation.ko: 협박 전화를 받고 있으며 돈을 갈취당하고 있다고

translation.en: We started to monitor the telephones.
We heard some kind of a dispute going on.
translation.ko: 일종의 논쟁이 진행 중인 걸 들었죠

translation.en: Highly abusive language.
Not because of any extortion,
they are discussing something about cricket.
And then we heard, "Hi, Hansie."
"Hi, Hansie."
Who else could it be except Hansie Cronje?
[commentator] And again. Well, this is magnificent stuff from Cronje.
translation.ko: 또 해냅니다, 핸시 크론예가 멋지게 쳐냈습니다

translation.en: [Ugra] Hansie Cronje was one of the most admired cricketers in the world.
translation.ko: 핸시 크론예는 세계에서 가장 존경받는 선수였어요

translation.en: Picked for South African captaincy very early in his career.
Recording for television?
Can I say hello to my mother?
[Ugra] Everybody loved Hansie.
He had the finest qualities.

translation.en: They wanted the best investigation.
translation.ko: CBI 국장이 저를 호출했어요 이들은 최상의 수사를 원했죠 "라비 사와니 전 CBI 특범 공동 이사"

translation.en: "Would your unit be able to handle this?"
translation.ko: '당신 팀으로 이 문제를 처리할 수 있겠어요?'

translation.en: I was never a crazy fan for cricket.
I was more of an enthusiast about boxing and horse riding.
But the kind of allegations that were being made at that point of time,
translation.ko: 하지만 이 시점에서 이런 혐의가 있다는 게

translation.en: they were absolutely unbelievable.
How could we think anybody throwing a game which he was playing for the nation?
translation.ko: 국가를 대표해 뛰는 경기를 일부러 진다니 상상이 되나요?

translation.en: So I just grabbed at it. I said, "Why not, sir?"
"It would be an honor. Absolutely."
The CBI investigation was a massive story. It made for absolutely compelling viewing.
translation.ko: CBI의 수사는 엄청난 내용이었습니다 사람들은 눈을 뗄 수 없었죠

translation.en: Here at the CBI headquarters, there's almost a veil of secrecy.
translation.ko: 여기 CBI 본부에서 거의 비밀의 장막이 있습니다

translation.en: Cricketers and alleged bookies will be interrogated in the coming weeks.
translation.ko: 크리켓 선수와 혐의가 있는 업자가 내주 심문을 받습니다

translation.en: [Sawani] The eyes of the entire nation were fixed on the CBI.
translation.ko: 전 국민의 눈이 CBI를 주목하고 있습니다

translation.en: What happened? What is the truth?
As a muckraker, you have to get into areas which you think are going to be tough.
translation.ko: 폭로자로서, 힘들 것이라 생각하는 영역에 들어가야 해요 "무랄리 크리슈난 아웃룩지 조사 저널리스트"

translation.en: No-go areas.
Even though this is a very high-profile case
where reputations are going to be made or marred,
I managed to sort of, uh, worm my way
with some of the key people involved in this investigation.
The CBI's expertise has largely been uncovering corruption
translation.ko: CBI의 전문 분야는 주로 다양한 다른 측면에서

translation.en: in various other facets, but not in cricket.
I don't think they really had an inkling on how big the case would turn out to be.
translation.ko: 이 사건이 얼마나 커질지 눈치 못 챘을 거라 생각해요

translation.en: [Sawani] Frankly, when we started this investigation,
there was only this one allegation made by Manoj Prabhakar
that Kapil Dev offered him 25 lakh rupees.
People did want to know,
is there any truth in what Manoj Prabhakar is saying?
[Bahal] We knew the CBI would be interested in what we had done.
translation.ko: CBI가 우리가 한 일에 관심을 보일 거라 생각했죠

translation.en: The next thing we knew, the CBI wanted all our material.
translation.ko: 얼마 안 가 CBI는 우리의 모든 자료를 원했어요

translation.en: [reporter] Prabhakar seems sure that after watching his tape,
the CBI will be able to take decisive action
translation.ko: CBI가 결정적인 조치를 취할 수 있을 거라 생각합니다

translation.en: against some Indian players.
[in Hindi] If you speak with them, you will understand,
I have proven who it was that offered me the bribe.
translation.ko: 뇌물 수수를 제안한 사람이 누구였는지 저는 증명했죠

translation.en: [man on laptop, in English] Azhar was officially… Yes!
[Sawani] We did glean all the information that was there in those tapes.
translation.ko: 우린 그 테이프에 포함된 모든 정보를 얻었어요

translation.en: [Sawani] There were a lot of allegations flying around,
but I wouldn't say
that there was any major evidence which could nail somebody without doubt.
[Krishnan] The problem with sting operations using hidden cameras is,
translation.ko: 비밀 카메라를 사용한 잠입 작전의 문제는

translation.en: it was mostly anecdotal evidence.
There was no empirical material evidence.
But RN Sawani was a very smart officer.
translation.ko: 하지만 라빈드라 나트 사와니는 매우 현명한 수사관이었어요

translation.en: He was keen on looking at the bigger picture.
[Sawani] Tehelka tapes did expose the underbelly
in the world of cricket
and showed the role of the illegal bookies.
[in English] The CBI had to find out whether players were tainted
translation.ko: CBI는 선수들의 부패 여부를 밝혀내야 했습니다

translation.en: and what kind of nexus they did enjoy with bookmakers.
[Sawani] My team started to gather every bookie
translation.ko: 인도의 모든 경찰서에 잡힌 적이 있는

translation.en: who had ever been booked by any police station in the country.
translation.ko: 모든 도박업자를 저희 팀은 모으기 시작했습니다

translation.en: This spread to Mumbai, Delhi, Gujarat region, Rajasthan.
translation.ko: 이는 뭄바이, 델리, 구자르트 라자스탄까지 확대됐죠

translation.en: Within the first week,
we had 209 top bookies of the country in our list.
[bookie on tape, in Hindi] When the CBI agent got involved,
translation.ko: "익명의 도박업자의 목소리" CBI 요원이 관여했을 때

translation.en: it created a very fearful atmosphere for us.
It was such a big scandal.
We were scared that any of us
translation.ko: 우리 중 누군가가 끌려갈 수 있다는 게

translation.en: could be dragged in.
But the aim of the CBI was not to catch bookies.
translation.ko: 하지만 CBI의 목적은 도박업자 체포가 아니었죠

translation.en: Their main motive was to get deeper into this case.
translation.ko: 주 목적은 이 사건을 더 깊게 파고드는 거였습니다

translation.en: Get knowledge and information.
[man on radio, in Hindi] 83, 58-59…
[in English] We found that there was a system called a "dabba system."
[man on radio] 85-8…
[Sawani] It would broadcast the odd rates to all the bookies at the same time.
translation.ko: 동시에 모든 도박업자에게 배당률을 방송하는 거였죠

translation.en: [man on radio, in Hindi] 85-8, 58-59…
[bookie on tape] A man is constantly giving rates, or Bhao.
translation.ko: 한 사람이 계속 배당률이나 브하오를 제공했죠

translation.en: Who that man is, no one knows. It's just a voice.
He will say the amount and name of the team
translation.ko: 이 사람이 금액과 팀의 이름을 말합니다

translation.en: and we make a note of it.
[man on radio] 80-83, 62-63…
[bookie on tape] All over India, and the world, there is only one rate going, at one time.
translation.ko: 인도 전역, 그리고 전 세계에 한 번에 한 비율만 전달됩니다

translation.en: We don't want to know who gives these rates.
translation.ko: 누가 이 비율을 전달하는지 알고 싶지 않았어요

translation.en: [Ugra, in English] Every bookie was dealing with somebody at a higher level.
translation.ko: "도박업자 도박꾼" 모든 도박업자는 더 높은 누군가와 거래했죠

translation.en: And it is almost like a ladder at which it goes to the person right at the top
who makes all the big money there is.
translation.ko: 제일 위에 있는 사람에게 가는 사다리 같았어요

translation.en: [Sawani] As we dug further into this investigation,
it became bigger and bigger and bigger.
We found out the bookies were being controlled by criminals…
translation.ko: 도박업자들이 두바이와 샤르자의 범죄 집단에 의해

translation.en: in Dubai and Sharjah.
Sharjah was this Las Vegas of the Middle East.
Lot of Indians dream they will go to Sharjah to watch a match.
translation.ko: 많은 인도인의 꿈은 샤르자로 경기를 보러 가는 거죠

translation.en: Television stars,
movie stars,
their sunglasses and fashion and all that.
translation.ko: 이들의 선글라스와 패션 그리고 모든 것

translation.en: And amidst them all would be sitting a man,
translation.ko: 이 모든 것 가운데 앉아있는 한 남자가 있습니다

translation.en: India's most wanted criminal, Dawood Ibrahim.
translation.ko: 바로 인도 최대 지명 수배 범죄자인 다우드 이브라힘입니다

translation.en: He was known for controlling drugs.
He would kill anybody who wouldn't give him regular money.
translation.ko: 정기적으로 돈을 상납 안 하면 누구든 죽일 겁니다

translation.en: He would be sitting there talking on a telephone
and obviously giving orders on what should happen in the game.
translation.ko: 명백하게 경기에서 일어나야 할 일들을 지시하고 있죠

translation.en: And therefore, those who were in cricket in those days
had to suffer a lot of underworld pressure.
translation.ko: 뒤 세계의 엄청난 압박을 감내해야 하죠

translation.en: [Sawani] You must understand,
this bookie world is a dangerous world.
The crime syndicates are unforgiving to any who break the line.
translation.ko: 범죄 연합은 선을 넘는 자를 용서하지 않죠

translation.en: So nobody wanted to come out and say anything
about what's wrong with the game.
translation.ko: 누구도 나서서 폭로할 수가 없는 거죠

translation.en: But then a very, very important breakthrough came from South Africa.
[reporter 1] Cronje is to be cross-examined at the King Commission
translation.ko: 핸시 크론예는 승부조작 스캔들의 가장 큰 부분을 차지해

translation.en: as part of the latest development in the match-fixing scandal.
translation.ko: 왕실 위원회에서 반대 심문을 받을 예정이었죠

translation.en: [reporter 2] The aim of the commission is to get to the truth of the allegations.
translation.ko: 위원회의 목적은 승부조작 혐의의 진상을 규명하는 것이었어요

translation.en: At the same time as the CBI investigation, South Africans set up the King Commission
translation.ko: 동시에 CBI의 조사로 남아프리카 사람들은 왕실 위원회가

translation.en: to look into Hansie Cronje's confession.
I failed in my moral and professional duties.
I was not honest and I apologize unreservedly.
translation.ko: 저는 정직하지 못했으며 전적으로 사과드리는 바입니다

translation.en: His whole persona had changed.
He literally shrunk down in his chair.
But the most dramatic thing in the King Commission
translation.ko: 하지만 왕실 위원회에서 가장 드라마틱했던 요소는

translation.en: was when Hansie Cronje revealed
translation.ko: 핸시 크론예가 국제적인 불법 도박 네트워크와

translation.en: the Indian connection with a global network of illegal betting.
translation.ko: 인도의 관계를 폭로했다는 겁니다 "30,000달러를 대가로 경기 패배를 제안받다"

translation.en: Cronje said that he had been introduced to this bookie, M.K Gupta.
translation.ko: 크론예는 무케쉬 굽타라는 도박업자를 소개받았어요 "무케쉬 굽타"

translation.en: [Cronje] He asked me to speak to the other players
and gave me approximately 30,000 US dollars in cash to do so.
translation.ko: 그 대가로 약 30,000의 미국 달러를 현금으로 주었죠

translation.en: That was a big revelation.
We realized he would be a gold mine for us.
translation.ko: 그가 우리에게 엄청난 이득을 안겨줄 거라 생각했죠

translation.en: But M.K was not in our list of bookies.
translation.ko: 하지만 무케쉬 굽타는 우리의 도박업자 목록에 없었죠 "무케쉬 굽타"

translation.en: So, we started a big hunt.
[reporter] The CBI hunt for bookie M.K Gupta
translation.ko: CBI가 오늘부터 델리의 사우스 엑스텐시온 시장에서

translation.en: started today in Delhi's South Extension market.
Who was M.K Gupta?
No one knew what he looked like.
Now, would he have bodyguards? Would he have bouncers with him?
translation.ko: 그자에게 경호원이 있는지 경비가 있는지도 몰랐어요

translation.en: [Sawani] We went to his house, we searched his house.
We went to his relatives' places.
We found that he had a jewelry shop,
which was being manned by his father.
[Krishnan] I found out from his neighbors,
he did not mingle with people, he kept to himself.
Obviously, I thought he had to do that,
given the line of business he was in.
[Sawani] The moment this news came on TV,
he went underground and was nowhere to be found.
But somewhere, he learnt that the CBI is really after him
translation.ko: 하지만 언제부터 그는 CBI가 자신을 쫓는 걸 알게 됐고

translation.en: and that they would do anything to get at him,
translation.ko: 그를 잡기 위해서 뭐든 할 것이란 사실이

translation.en: and the pressure was on him all the time to come out.
translation.ko: 그가 나타나게끔 매 순간 압박감을 주었죠

translation.en: [Neeraj Kumar] I have always been a cricket fan from my childhood.
translation.ko: 저는 어릴 때부터 항상 크리켓 팬이었어요

translation.en: I put great cricketers
translation.ko: "니라즈 쿠마르 전 CBI 공동 이사" 저는 국가를 위해 뛰는

translation.en: who would serve the country on a high pedestal.
But in 2000, an informant came up to me
and said that someone wanted to surrender before me.
translation.ko: 그러고는 누군가가 저에게 항복하고 싶어 한다고 알려줬죠

translation.en: A guy called M.K Gupta.
I said, "Why me?"
Because I was not inquiring into the matter.
So he said, "Sir, he has seen you in a public meeting
translation.ko: 그러자 정보원은 무케쉬 굽타가 공청회에서 당신을 봤고

translation.en: and somehow he feels that if he meets you,
translation.ko: 어쩐지 당신을 만나면 자신을 이끌어줄 것 같은

translation.en: you can guide him."
I felt important. I am like… I am the chosen one.
We decided to meet in a super deluxe hotel.
I was very sure of the informant.
So, I went without any backup.
And a very ordinary-looking person opened the door.
translation.ko: 아주 평범한 인상의 사람이 문을 열었어요

translation.en: [in Hindi] Yes, sir.
[in English] Please come in.
Then I suddenly see two more people in the room.
translation.ko: 그 후 두 사람이 더 방 안에 있는 걸 보았고

translation.en: Then I became a little anxious.
So I took a long breath.
And I said, "Why do you want to meet me?"
translation.ko: 그러고는 누가 나랑 만나고 싶은 사람인지 물었죠

translation.en: He says…
[in Hindi] "Sir, I am to blame for this entire fiasco."
[in English] "I am at the root of all the problems."
And as he began to talk,
I realized that my tryst with corruption in cricket had commenced.
translation.ko: 크리켓의 부패와 밀회가 시작되었다는 걸 깨달았어요

translation.en: He was telling me such secrets,
I decided to take him back to the CBI headquarters.
translation.ko: 저는 그를 CBI 본부로 데려가기로 했습니다

translation.en: [Sawani] When we brought Mukesh Gupta into the CBI,
he was certainly scared.
If he was to reveal the names of anybody,
his life was in danger, definitely.
But we assured Mukesh Gupta,
"No harm will come to you once you tell us the truth."
translation.ko: 진실을 말해주면 어떤 위해도 입지 않을 거라고요

translation.en: And finally, he was willing to tell us his story.
Mukesh Gupta was a graduate from one of the Delhi colleges.
translation.ko: 무케쉬 굽타는 델리에 위치한 한 대학의 졸업생이었어요

translation.en: He was initially employed with a bank.
[Kumar] When he would walk home,
at the road corner, he would watch people betting on cricket.
translation.ko: 도로 코너에서 크리켓에 베팅하는 사람들을 봤어요

translation.en: He had never played cricket himself,
translation.ko: 그는 크리켓을 직접 해본 적이 없었지만

translation.en: but in double-quick time,
he understood all the finer points of the game.
translation.ko: 그는 크리켓의 멋진 부분을 모두 이해했어요

translation.en: [Sawani] At that point of time, he would also go and watch
translation.ko: 그 시점부터 그는 지역 운동장에서 크리켓을 하는

translation.en: kids playing cricket in the local grounds.
[Kumar] He understood that if you spot somebody with talent,
you can groom a youngster.
translation.ko: 자기가 키울 수 있을 거라 생각했죠

translation.en: And that was when he met Ajay Sharma.
[Ugra] Ajay Sharma was a boy from not a very wealthy family
translation.ko: 아제이 샤르마는 델리에서 뛰고 있는 평범한 집안의

translation.en: playing in Delhi.
He plays a great innings, he scores a hundred,
translation.ko: 훌륭한 이닝 플레이를 했고 많은 점수를 기록했죠

translation.en: someone puts hundred bucks in his pocket and says, "I'm so happy. I'm a fan."
translation.ko: 누가 그의 주머니에 큰돈을 넣으며 팬이라고 했습니다

translation.en: [Sawani] At the time, he didn't realize what was happening
translation.ko: 아제이 샤르마는 당시에 무슨 일인지 몰랐어요

translation.en: and he felt elated that somebody was appreciating his game.
translation.ko: 누군가가 자신의 경기를 감상했다는 게 기쁠 뿐이었죠

translation.en: But bookies think long period.
They will cultivate a player for years and years
before they come up with their first request.
translation.ko: 이 선수를 수년 동안 키우는 것이었죠

translation.en: [bookie on tape, in Hindi] We meet them as any normal person would.
We don't tell them we are bookies.
You get to know their weaknesses.
[in English] Gifts, parties, women…
[in Hindi] Alcohol is very useful.
Once you have befriended them,
they are willing to talk.
Then you strike a deal.
[Kumar, in English] And Ajay Sharma rose to be a national cricketer.
translation.ko: 아제이 샤르마는 국가 대표 크리켓 선수가 되었습니다

translation.en: And M.K Gupta got so much inside information,
translation.ko: 무케쉬 굽타는 많은 내부 정보를 가지고 있었어요

translation.en: he made lots and lots of money.
And he shared that money with Ajay Sharma.
translation.ko: 그리고 그 돈을 아제이 샤르마와 나누었습니다

translation.en: [Sawani] Once you're in,
you know, it's like the insects who get into the wood-borer.
translation.ko: 이제 나무를 파먹는 벌레처럼 되는 거죠

translation.en: Then you are caught for life.
Mukesh Gupta would say, "You've told me this, I paid you this."
translation.ko: 업자는 '네가 말해줬으니 돈을 준 거야'라고 하죠

translation.en: Perhaps he would even be recording the conversation.
He would be able to blackmail the player.
translation.ko: 해당 선수에게 협박 메일을 보낼 수 있을 테니까요

translation.en: And it is Ajay Sharma who introduced Mukesh Gupta
to no other person than the captain himself…
translation.ko: 무케쉬 굽타를 소개한 건 다름 아닌

translation.en: Mohammed Azharuddin.
[commentator] That's straight down the ground. It's in the air…
Azharuddin.
Azharuddin.
-Azharuddin. -Mohammed Azharuddin.
[Sawani] That was a big revelation.
It was really, really at the top at that point of time.
The icon for the country.
And any allegation against him
could not be palatable to the Indian public.
Could Mukesh Gupta bribe somebody like Mohammed Azharuddin?
I felt the pressure to find out what is the truth.
translation.ko: "주장 기간: (1990-1999)" 진실을 알아내야 한다는 압박감을 느꼈어요

translation.en: -[man in Hindi] Does the color look right? -It's fabulous.
[woman] The color is lovely, but it's not jittering, right?
It's a summer color.
Had I worn a dark one, it'd have been awful in this heat.
translation.ko: 어두운 걸 입으면 이 더위에는 끔찍했겠죠

translation.en: [in English] Azhar was never a communicative person.
translation.ko: 모하메드 아자루딘은 소통이 되는 사람은 아니었죠

translation.en: He's not somebody who can really tell you what he's thinking or feeling.
translation.ko: 진정으로 자신의 생각과 감정을 말하는 사람은 아니었죠

translation.en: -This shirt is nice, right? -Very nice.
I didn't wear a dark-colored shirt…
[in Hindi] But I hope it's not jittering.
[in English] Reticent, reluctant, very nervous.

translation.ko: 놀랍게도 그는 집에 가서 그가 말한 모든 것을 적고

translation.en: and faxed them to his wife, Sangeeta Bijlani.
Point-by-point,
he listed all the various things that he had told us.
translation.ko: 그는 자신이 말했던 다양한 내용을 모두 나열했어요

translation.en: For example, the introduction to M.K by Ajay Sharma.
translation.ko: 예를 들어 아제이 샤르마에게 무케쉬 굽타를 소개받았다든지요

translation.en: He had also written in the fax about his shopping spree in Harrods.
translation.ko: "이들은 해러즈 쇼핑 중에도 나를 지켜봤다" 또한 해러즈에서의 쇼핑에 관한 내용도 팩스에 적었죠

translation.en: That bill had been paid by one of the bookies.
translation.ko: 그 청구 내역은 업자 중 한 명이 지불했어요

translation.en: So that corroborated that, you know,
Azharuddin indeed had told all that things to us.
translation.ko: 모하메드 아자루딘이 정말로 우리에게 모든 걸 말한 거죠

translation.en: He has been consistent all throughout
in saying that he was not involved in match-fixing,
and any confession before a police officer is essentially under pressure.
translation.ko: 경찰관 앞에서 한 모든 자백은 압박감에 의해 한 거라고요

translation.en: We were quite certain that he was involved.
translation.ko: 우리는 그가 연루된 것에 꽤나 확신을 가지고 있습니다

translation.en: Left no room for any doubt.
[interviewer] These allegations came and just ended your career abruptly.
translation.ko: 이제 이 승부조작 혐의로 갑작스레 커리어가 끝났는데요

translation.en: How did you cope with that? What did you do?
Infinite patience. That's the only thing you can have.
I mean, if anybody possesses that, infinite patience,
I think they'll always come out successful.
-Thank you for being on the couch with me. -My pleasure.
Although not answering all the questions that honestly.
Maybe next time.
-We should have another couch with you. -Maybe next time…
translation.ko: - 또 한번 얘기를 나누죠 - 아마 다음에요

translation.en: [Ugra] Once Mohammed Azharuddin was banned,
there was a kind of a… "Let's move on. Let's move ahead from here."
translation.ko: 일종의 움직임이 있었습니다 여기서 나아가자는 움직임이요

translation.en: The CBI report had a huge impact. It changed cricket.
translation.ko: CBI 보고서는 큰 영향을 주었고 크리켓도 변했죠 "대규모 조치 필요"

translation.en: The main thing that we were able to do
translation.ko: 우리가 할 수 있는 주된 일은

translation.en: was start this process of educating players.
Now they are told of the dangers lurking around them.
translation.ko: 이제 선수들은 주변에 숨어있는 위험에 대해 교육받습니다

translation.en: How you can be cultivated, how you can be trapped.
translation.ko: 어떻게 씨를 뿌리고 어떻게 함정을 놓는지요

translation.en: So they can avoid getting corrupted.
translation.ko: 그렇게 해서 부패를 피할 수 있습니다

translation.en: [bookie on tape, in Hindi] Today anti-corruption is everywhere.
An anti-corruption team stay in the hotel with the players.
Even if one is able to get the players' phone numbers,
translation.ko: 누군가가 선수의 전화번호를 받아갈 수는 있어도

translation.en: anti-corruption have an eye all over.
translation.ko: 반부패 팀의 눈은 못 피할 겁니다

translation.en: But gambling is still big.
No one can leave it.
I have never even tried.
This is my job.
[Ugra] When I look back at that time,
it was almost like growing up.
[chuckles] In sports journalism, it's like saying, "Wake up."
translation.ko: 스포츠 저널리즘에서 마치 정신 차리란 듯이

translation.en: Getting a slap on your fae and saying, "Wake up. This is what real life is like."
translation.ko: 뺨을 딱 치고는 말하는 거죠 '정신 차려 이게 현실의 모습이야'

translation.en: And so, for me, the superstars have gone away and faded,
but what I love is being part of the cricket community.
translation.ko: 하지만 제가 사랑하는 건 크리켓 사회에 참여하는 거예요

translation.en: Being part of the family.
It always comes back to cricket,
because it can just set you alight with a piece of action
translation.ko: 크리켓은 한 번의 동작만으로 저에게 불을 붙여주거든요

translation.en: that you can't find in any other sport.
translation.ko: 다른 어떤 스포츠에도 이런 건 없죠

translation.en: [commentator] Gone! Off stump…
Unbelievable performance from India.
[in Hindi] I will not be taking any further legal action.
translation.ko: 더는 법적 조치를 취하지 않을 겁니다

translation.en: I'm very happy with the court's decision.
[in English] Uh, the case was overturned only on account of technical reasons.
translation.ko: 기술적인 이유 하나 때문에 처분이 번복되었습니다

translation.en: We, in CBI, are absolutely certain
that Mr. Mohammed Azharuddin was involved in match-fixing.
And we said it with lot of evidence available at hand.
translation.ko: 우리는 확인 가능한 많은 증거와 함께 주장했었죠

translation.en: [in Hindi] I want to do something in cricket
translation.ko: 뭐라도 있다면 크리켓에서 뭔가 하고 싶어요 수년간 해온 거니까요

translation.en: because I have played so many years.
translation.ko: 크리켓에서 뭔가 하고 싶어요 수년간 해온 거니까요

translation.en: I would want to share my experience
with the young generation of cricketers.
[reporter] Azhar, uh…
[in Hindi] The board is ill-informed,
and I'm disappointed by its decision,
which I feel is arbitrary and discriminatory.
[in English] I do not think that M.K had any remorse as such.
translation.ko: 무케쉬 굽타가 양심의 가책을 느끼지는 않을 것 같아요

translation.en: He had made enough money
and, uh, that it was time for him to,
uh, shall we say, enjoy his earnings.
Now I can go back and sleep properly.
translation.ko: 이제 돌아가서 제대로 잘 수 있겠습니다

translation.en: Nothing… Leave it to the government agencies.
The allegation made by Manoj Prabhakar against Kapil Dev
translation.ko: 마노즈 프라바카르가 말한 카필 데브의 혐의는

translation.en: were not corroborated by any kind of evidence.
The nation's spirit would have broken if they found Kapil Dev was involved.
translation.ko: "입증할 신뢰할 수 있는 증거가 없다고 할 수 있다" 카필 데브의 연루를 밝혀내면 국가의 혼이 무너졌을 겁니다

translation.en: And to that extent, I think everybody was very relieved
that he's not involved.
[man, in Hindi] Get the car!
[Sawani, in English] When Mukesh Gupta revealed
that he had dealings with Manoj Prabhakar also,
that… the entire tables turned.
Perhaps he may not have been as bold in taking part in the sting operations
translation.ko: 자신이 노출될 것을 알았다면 잠입 작전에 참여할 때

translation.en: if he had ever known that he himself will be exposed.
[in Hindi] I never expected that this thing would end this way.
translation.ko: 이렇게 될 거라고는 전혀 예상하지 못했습니다

translation.en: I was the one who originally exposed this in front of the public.
translation.ko: 처음에 이 사실을 대중 앞에서 알린 게 바로 접니다

translation.en: If I was involved, I would never have started it.
[Bahal] We don't know the extent, if at all,
of Manoj's involvement in the match-fixing saga.
We did ask him, we did confront him, but he denied everything to us.
translation.ko: 그에게 물어보며 마주했지만 모든 걸 부인했습니다

translation.en: You could say that Manoj Prabhakar
translation.ko: 마노즈 프라바카르는 가장 큰 배짱을 지녔거나

translation.en: was possibly the most gutsy or the most foolish.
translation.ko: 가장 멍청한 거라고 할 수 있죠

translation.en: You know, in that sense, to me, it was enormously gutsy.
translation.ko: 그런 의미에서 제게 이 사건은 엄청난 배짱이 필요했어요
